description: Design prompt templates for character and location creation phases

naming.placeholder: What would you like to name them?

appearance.prompt_template: Help us bring {name} to life! Describe how {name} looks like
appearance.placeholder: Write 1-2 sentences about what they look like

dreams.prompt_template: Help give more details to {name}. What does {name} dream of becoming?
dreams.placeholder: Write about their hopes and dreams. They are dreaming to become

skills.prompt_template: Help give more details to {name}. What is {name} amazing at?

flaws.prompt_template: Help us design {name}! Describe a small, relatable flaw
flaws.placeholder: Describe a small, relatable flaw in 1-2 sentences

naming.placeholder: What would you like to call this place?

appearance.prompt_template: Help us bring {name} to life! Describe what this place looks like
appearance.placeholder: Write 1-2 sentences. What do you see when you look around?

sounds_smells.prompt_template: What can you hear and smell in {name}?
sounds_smells.placeholder: Describe the sounds and smells. You can hear...

mood_weather.prompt_template: What is the atmosphere in {name} like?
mood_weather.placeholder: Describe the mood and atmosphere. This place feels...

unique_feature.placeholder: Describe what makes this place unique. The most special thing here is...
